duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide online connection support for gaming systems.
Troubleshoot hardware issues and set up product repairs as needed.
Troubleshoot connection problems including walking consumers through network security settings and router settings.
Answer consumer questions regarding the online features of their game systems.
Resolve account issues (login issues, fraudulent charges, account bans, etc.)
Collect consumer information for incident tracking.
Inform consumers about products and services.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
